title: Admin will receive this email when there is a new contact us request
description:
Dear [NAME]

You have received a new contact request, please click below link to check more details.

Contact Us

If you’re having trouble clicking the 'Contact Us' button, copy and paste the URL below into your web browser:

[LINK]

If you have any questions, please email us at [SUPPORT_EMAIL]
subject: Contact us Request
keyword:
Information PlaceHolder Explaination
1 [NAME] This will be replaced by First Name and Last Name of user.
2 [LINK]] This will be replaced by conatct us link in email.

title: User will receive this email when there is a new notification
description:
Dear [FirstName] [LastName],

You have a new notification, kindly check in your account.

[ACTION].
subject: You have a new notification
keyword:
Information PlaceHolder Explaination
1 [FirstName] [LastName] This will be replaced by First Name and Last Name of user.
2 [ACTION] This will be replaced by ACTION in email.

title: This email is sent to when a new user registered
description:
Dear [FirstName] [LastName],

Your account has been successfully created by the administrator, please check the below details.

Email: [EMAIL]

Password: [PASSWORD]

Thanks
subject: Account Confirmation
keyword:
Information PlaceHolder Explaination
1 [FirstName] [LastName] This will be replaced by First Name and Last Name of user.
2 [EMAIL] This will be replaced by EMAIL in email.
3 [PASSWORD] This will be replaced by PASSWORD in email.

title: This email is sent to user when user clicks Forgot Password
subject: Forgot Password
keyword:
Information PlaceHolder Explaination
1 [FirstName] [LastName] This will be replaced by First Name and Last Name of user.
2 [OTP] This will be replaced by OTP in email.

title: This email is sent to when create a new key personnel
description:

[COMPANY_NAME]  add your account as key personnel.

Thanks
subject: New key personnel
keyword:
Information PlaceHolder Explaination

2 [COMPANY_NAME] This will be replaced by COMPANY_NAME in company name.
